text: Va agar jake az zanoni sumo murtad sud va ʙa kofiron pajvast va kofiron mahre, ki sumo dar haqqi on zanon sarf namudaed, ʙa sumo nadodand va on goh sumo dar cang ʙar onon piruz suded va ʙa intiqom az kofiron ʙarxosted, pas az amvoli ƣanimat girifta suda ʙa kasone, ki zanonason ʙa sui kofiron raftaand, monandi on cize, ki xarc kardaand dar mahri on zanon, ʙidihed va az Allohe, ki ʙa U imon dored, ʙitarsed
